title: I Cooked Against Robots
transcript:
Nick: Robots are becoming more and more like humans.
They can build cars, clean your house, and even do parkour.
But in this video, I'm cooking against three levels of robots to find out who's the better
chef. Robots or humans.
For level one, Mark Rober will be the judge.
Mark: We're gonna see if Nick can beat some of the most basic kitchen robots that money can buy.
And level one will have five speed rounds chopping, stirring, toasting, pizza making
and cleaning. And to win, it's a classic best three out of five.
